short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable Solana Blinks on socials, with wallet support (including OAuth)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enable Solana Actions and Dialect Blinks on any social platform. 

Key Features:
- Seamless Integration: Automatically detects Action-compatible URLs and converts them into user-friendly, actionable Blinks on supported websites.
- Wallet Support: Compatible with Solana wallets including Phantom, Solflare and Tiplink Social Login, ensuring secure and streamlined transactions.

With Blinks, engaging and interacting with web3 is as simple as sharing a link
